### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19179 ([WIP RFC DONOTMERGE] ci: Run ci configs on cirrus by MarcoFalke)

If you consider this pull request important, p

https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5400693085306880?command=ci#L4756:
```
FAIL: qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt
=============================
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 51
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 51
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50

> It can detect a bug: https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5693953116733440?command=ci#L4686

However it seems strange.
```
test_bitcoin-qt_orig: chainparams.cpp:113: CMainParams::CMainParams(): Assertion `consensus.hashGenesisBlock == uint256S("0x000000000019d6689c085ae165831e934ff763ae46a2a6c172b3f1b60a8ce26f")' failed.
```

Not worth the effort. Let's just remove it (#20315)
